column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The cafe downstairs was a disappointment. I bought the corn meat sandwich and thought that it would be made to order
column2: but nope!!! The caterer actually took a sandwich from the refrigerator and basically cut it in half and handed it to me. The sandwich was so cold
column3: didn't like at all (2 stars). If it was freshly made
column4: I would probably like it better.
